law.text: No person, firm, or corporation shall be permitted more than one (1) money recovery upon a claim for the enforcement of or for breach of contract with the Commonwealth.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted as KRS 45A.265, 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 53, effective January 1, 1979. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 180, sec. 5.
